g.text: SNS User
Nurse
Center Coordinator
Receptionist
Administrator
UC3: As a receptionist, I want to register a SNS user
UC9: As a administrator, I want to register a vaccination center to respond to certain pandemic
UC10: As a administrator, I want to register a Employee
UC11: As a administrator, I want to get a list of Employees with a given function/role
UC12: As a administrator, I intent to specify a new vaccine type
UC13: As a administrator, I intent to specify a new vaccine and its administration process
UC1: Schedule vaccination
UC2: Request EU COVID Digital Certificate
UC14: Authorize the DGS to send SMS message with information about appointment
UC4: Register the arrival of a SNS user to take the vaccine
UC5: Schedule a vaccine for a user
UC6: Confirm that the SNS user has the vaccine scheduled
UC7: Record adverse reactions of a SNS user
UC8: Record the administration of a vaccine to a SNS user
UC20: Check the list of SNS users that are present in the vaccination center
UC21: Check the user info and health conditions
UC23: Issue and deliver vaccination certificate for SNS user
UC22: Get instructions regarding the vaccine to be administered
UC16: Register the vaccine type, brand and lot number
UC17: Monitor the vaccination process
UC18: Evaluate the performance of the vaccination process
UC19: Analyse reports concerning vaccination process
